dialogue.introduction: Light Cruiser Nagara! Please take good care of me!
dialogue.library_intro: Weighing in as a 5500 ton light cruiser, first ship of the Nagara-class, Nagara! I'm a bit of an old model, but I'm a high-speed torpedo-armed team-leading machine, so I'm just perfect to command destroyers, you know? I even fought hard in the difficult Battle of the Solomons!
dialogue.secretary1: Commander, thanks for the hard work!
dialogue.secretary2: Done my miles for the day!
dialogue.secretary3: The commander is interested too? I've been working on my legs recently...
dialogue.wedding: Thank you for always leading us to victory! Nagara also loves the commander!
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: It's time! Leave it to me!
dialogue.equipment2: Mhm! My body is light. Thank You!
dialogue.docking_complete: Looks like the repair is complete.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The operation's over, the fleet's back.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Torpedo squadron, sortieing! I'm itching for a fight!
dialogue.battle_start: Enemy ship spotted! Ready for surface action!
dialogue.night_battle: Pursuing! I won't give you a gap to break through!
dialogue.night_attack: Can you keep up with Nagara's legs?
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Can you keep up with Nagara's legs?
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Can you keep up with Nagara's legs?
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Can you keep up with Nagara's legs?
dialogue.mvp: V-I-C-T-O-R-Y! Vic~to~ry! The sound of success!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: If I had only trained more... Dammit!!
dialogue.sunk: I wanted to run with everyone some more...
